Minecart control scrolls are instructions given to the player by Miriam. It is used to set up the Lovakengj Minecart Network. They are given to Loinur, Mogrim, Traxi, Raeli, and Stuliette to complete the network.

Players can use the Check option to find out the locations of the NPCs.

Locations[edit | edit source]

The Arceuus station is by the north-east corner of the library, in the north of the town.
The Shayzien station is east of the Shayzien Encampment, north of Shayzien.
The Hosidius station is north of the Woodcutting Guild, south-west of the Forthos Ruin.
The Piscarilius station is south of the town, next to a small mine.
The Mount Quidamortem station is south of the bank, near the lake.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Clicking 'Check' on extra scrolls after unlocking all Lovakengj Minecart Network locations deletes all the scrolls and a dialogue box appears with the message, "All stations are unlocked."

[[File:Minecart control scroll detail.png|left|100px]]
'''Minecart control scrolls''' are instructions given to the player by [[Miriam]]. It is used to set up the [[Lovakengj Minecart Network]]. They are given to [[Loinur]], [[Mogrim]], [[Traxi]], [[Raeli]], and [[Stuliette]] to complete the network.

Players can use the ''Check'' option to find out the locations of the NPCs.

==Locations==
{| class="wikitable lighttable"
|-
|The ''[[Arceuus]]'' station is by the north-east corner of the [[Arceuus Library|library]], in the north of the town.
|-
|The ''[[Shayzien]]'' station is east of the [[Shayzien Encampment]], north of [[Shayzien]].
|-
|The ''[[Hosidius]]'' station is north of the [[Woodcutting Guild]], south-west of the [[Forthos Ruin]].
|-
|The ''[[Port Piscarilius|Piscarilius]]'' station is south of the town, next to a small mine.
|-
|The ''[[Mount Quidamortem]]'' station is south of the bank, near the lake.
|}

==Trivia==
* Clicking 'Check' on extra scrolls after unlocking all Lovakengj Minecart Network locations deletes all the scrolls and a dialogue box appears with the message, ''"All stations are unlocked."''
